name: 2025 6th Asia Conference on Renewable Energy And Environmental Engineering (AREEE 2025
content: Submissions will be reviewed by both the conference committees and IJESD editorial board, accepted papers will be sent to International Journal of Environmental Science and Development for publication in regular issues, which will be indexed by Scopus (CiteScore in 2022: 1.4), Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
